Class Board

java.lang.Object
lista4.gameLogic.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents the Go board and handles stone placement, capturing, and rule enforcement. Manages board state including Ko situations, suicides, and chains of stones.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Board.Direction
    Represents the four orthogonal directions for neighboring fields.

  • Method Details

    • inBoardBoundries

      public boolean inBoardBoundries(int x, int y)
      Checks whether the specified coordinates are inside the board.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      Returns:
      true if coordinates are within board bounds

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty(int x, int y)
      Checks if the field at (x, y) is empty (no stone present).
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the field is empty

    • checkSuicide

      public boolean checkSuicide(Set<StoneChain> chains, Stone stone)
      Determines if placing a stone would be suicide, taking into account friendly chains and their liberties.
      Parameters:
      chains - Set of neighboring friendly chains
      stone - Stone to be placed
      Returns:
      true if the move would result in suicide

    • putStone

      public void putStone(int x, int y, Stone stone) throws FieldNotAvailableException
      Places a stone on the board and handles capturing, merging chains, suicide checks, and Ko rule.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate to place the stone
      y - Y coordinate to place the stone
      stone - Stone to be placed
      Throws:
      FieldNotAvailableException - if the field is already occupied or move is illegal

    • removeStone

      public void removeStone(int x, int y)
      Removes the stone from the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate

    • getField

      public Field getField(int x, int y)
      Returns the Field object at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      Returns:
      Field at coordinates, or null if out of bounds

    • getStone

      public Stone getStone(int x, int y)
      Returns the Stone at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate
      y - Y coordinate
      Returns:
      Stone at coordinates, or null if empty or out of bounds

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the size of the board (number of fields per side).
      Returns:
      board size
